messages.subject: koshirae data file
messages.msgSnippet: After Bob R. clued me in that there is a place to post non-photo files, I uploaded that Excel spreadsheet of koshirae stats to the group web site at:
messages.messageBody:
After Bob R. clued me in that there is a place to post non-photo files, I uploaded that Excel spreadsheet of koshirae stats to the group web site at:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/files/

It's called katana koshirae.xls. It opened in an Explorer browser window for me, but it probably won't play for non-Microsoft users.

Jim

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
